availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nicholas J. Wellington (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer and school teacher.)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer and schoolteacher. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Caroline Aud Wellington in Nelson County on November 9, 1841. Father of E. M. Wellington, F. J. Wellington, Mary Lois Wellington, Thomas Wellington, Lawrence Wellington, and Stella Wellington. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Schoolteacher in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 298A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 255.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, Bardstown, p. 20B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, 1839-1845, Film #000481507, p. 57 of 626 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
